languages.text: "Это была посредственная попытка и далеко не первая. Но мои блюстители и мой трон хранят меня". {n}Похлопав по поручню, Инцендия улыбается.{/n} "Его отражающее поле не возьмет даже танковый выстрел. Одна из священных реликвий друзианцев, которую вор Токара припрятал в своих кладовых".

traits.locale_text: "Это была посредственная попытка и далеко не первая. Но мои блюстители и мой трон хранят меня". {n}Похлопав по поручню, Инцендия улыбается.{/n} "Его отражающее поле не возьмет даже танковый выстрел. Одна из священных реликвий друзианцев, которую вор Токара припрятал в своих кладовых".
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "This attempt was mediocre and far from the first. But my enforcers and my throne keep me safe." {n}Incendia pats an armrest and smiles.{/n} "Its refractor field is impervious even to tank shells. That thief Tocara had this sacred Drusian relic stashed in one of his storerooms."
languages.original_text: "Это была посредственная попытка и далеко не первая. Но мои блюстители и мой трон хранят меня". {n}Похлопав по поручню, Инцендия улыбается.{/n} "Его отражающее поле не возьмет даже танковый выстрел. Одна из священных реликвий друзианцев, которую вор Токара припрятал в своих кладовых".

traits.locale_text: "This attempt was mediocre and far from the first. But my enforcers and my throne keep me safe." {n}Incendia pats an armrest and smiles.{/n} "Its refractor field is impervious even to tank shells. That thief Tocara had this sacred Drusian relic stashed in one of his storerooms."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “这次暗杀手段相当平庸。那些人已经不知道尝试过多少次了，但我的执法者和我的宝座保障了我的安全。”{n}因森蒂娅拍了拍扶手，笑了起来。{/n}“这个宝座的偏折力场，甚至连坦克炮弹都能挡下来。这是德鲁苏斯的圣物，之前被托卡拉那个小贼藏在了他的储藏室里。”
languages.original_text: "This attempt was mediocre and far from the first. But my enforcers and my throne keep me safe." {n}Incendia pats an armrest and smiles.{/n} "Its refractor field is impervious even to tank shells. That thief Tocara had this sacred Drusian relic stashed in one of his storerooms."

traits.locale_text: “这次暗杀手段相当平庸。那些人已经不知道尝试过多少次了，但我的执法者和我的宝座保障了我的安全。”{n}因森蒂娅拍了拍扶手，笑了起来。{/n}“这个宝座的偏折力场，甚至连坦克炮弹都能挡下来。这是德鲁苏斯的圣物，之前被托卡拉那个小贼藏在了他的储藏室里。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「こんな二流のやり方など、これまで何度も経験した。だが、私のエンフォーサーと王座が私を守ってくれる」{n}インセンディアは肘掛けを叩き、微笑んだ。{/n}「リフラクター・フィールドは戦車の砲弾すらも通さない。あの盗人トカラは、神聖なドルシアン遺物を物置のひとつに隠してあったのだ」
languages.original_text: "This attempt was mediocre and far from the first. But my enforcers and my throne keep me safe." {n}Incendia pats an armrest and smiles.{/n} "Its refractor field is impervious even to tank shells. That thief Tocara had this sacred Drusian relic stashed in one of his storerooms."

traits.locale_text: 「こんな二流のやり方など、これまで何度も経験した。だが、私のエンフォーサーと王座が私を守ってくれる」{n}インセンディアは肘掛けを叩き、微笑んだ。{/n}「リフラクター・フィールドは戦車の砲弾すらも通さない。あの盗人トカラは、神聖なドルシアン遺物を物置のひとつに隠してあったのだ」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Este atentado fue mediocre y no es el primero, pero mi personal de seguridad y mi trono me mantienen a salvo». {n}Incendia da golpecitos al reposabrazos y sonríe.{/n} «Su campo refractor es impermeable incluso a los proyectiles de los tanques. Ese ladrón, Tocara, tenía esta reliquia drusiana sagrada guardada en uno de sus almacenes».
languages.original_text: "This attempt was mediocre and far from the first. But my enforcers and my throne keep me safe." {n}Incendia pats an armrest and smiles.{/n} "Its refractor field is impervious even to tank shells. That thief Tocara had this sacred Drusian relic stashed in one of his storerooms."

traits.locale_text: «Este atentado fue mediocre y no es el primero, pero mi personal de seguridad y mi trono me mantienen a salvo». {n}Incendia da golpecitos al reposabrazos y sonríe.{/n} «Su campo refractor es impermeable incluso a los proyectiles de los tanques. Ese ladrón, Tocara, tenía esta reliquia drusiana sagrada guardada en uno de sus almacenes».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Dieser Versuch war mittelmäßig und weit entfernt davon, der erste zu sein. Doch meine Enforcers und mein Thron beschützen mich." {n}Incendia tätschelt eine Armlehne und grinst.{/n} "Das Refraktorfeld kann selbst Panzergeschossen standhalten. Dieser Dieb Tocara hatte das heilige drusianische Relikt in einem seiner Lagerräume stehen."
languages.original_text: "This attempt was mediocre and far from the first. But my enforcers and my throne keep me safe." {n}Incendia pats an armrest and smiles.{/n} "Its refractor field is impervious even to tank shells. That thief Tocara had this sacred Drusian relic stashed in one of his storerooms."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Versuch war mittelmäßig und weit entfernt davon, der erste zu sein. Doch meine Enforcers und mein Thron beschützen mich." {n}Incendia tätschelt eine Armlehne und grinst.{/n} "Das Refraktorfeld kann selbst Panzergeschossen standhalten. Dieser Dieb Tocara hatte das heilige drusianische Relikt in einem seiner Lagerräume stehen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Une tentative maladroite qui est loin d'être la première. Heureusement, mes prévôts et mon trône me protègent, {n}dit-elle avec un sourire en tapotant un accoudoir.{/n} Son champ réfracteur stopperait net un obus de char d'assaut. C'est une relique drusienne sacrée que ce voleur de Tocara gardait dans l'un de ses entrepôts. »
languages.original_text: "This attempt was mediocre and far from the first. But my enforcers and my throne keep me safe." {n}Incendia pats an armrest and smiles.{/n} "Its refractor field is impervious even to tank shells. That thief Tocara had this sacred Drusian relic stashed in one of his storerooms."

traits.locale_text: « Une tentative maladroite qui est loin d'être la première. Heureusement, mes prévôts et mon trône me protègent, {n}dit-elle avec un sourire en tapotant un accoudoir.{/n} Son champ réfracteur stopperait net un obus de char d'assaut. C'est une relique drusienne sacrée que ce voleur de Tocara gardait dans l'un de ses entrepôts. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Cılız bir teşebbüs, ilk denemeleri de değildi. Ancak infazcılarım ve tahtım beni güvende tuttu." {n}İncendia, eliyle bir kolçağa vurup gülümsüyor.{/n} "Işıkkıran alanı, tank mermilerine bile dayanıklıdır. Tocara denen o hırsızın depolarından birinde kutsal bir Drususçu yadigârı varmış."
languages.original_text: "This attempt was mediocre and far from the first. But my enforcers and my throne keep me safe." {n}Incendia pats an armrest and smiles.{/n} "Its refractor field is impervious even to tank shells. That thief Tocara had this sacred Drusian relic stashed in one of his storerooms."

traits.locale_text: "Cılız bir teşebbüstü ve ilk denemeleri de değildi ama infazcılarım ve tahtım beni güvende tuttu." {n}İncendia eliyle bir kolçağa vuruyor ve gülümsüyor.{/n} "Işıkkıran alanı, tank mermilerine bile dayanıklıdır. Tocara denen o hırsızın depolarından birinde kutsal bir Drusçu yadigârı varmış."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
